active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the challenges of maintaining PCI DSS compliance in a small e-commerce business versus a large financial institution. Consider factors like CDE scope, cost of implementation, and integration with existing security policies. Support arguments with references to the 12 PCI DSS requirements.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education, specializing in PCI DSS Policy Requirements (Topic Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Security And Risk Management > Security Policy Development > Policy Framework and Governance > Legal and Regulatory Compliance > PCI DSS Policy Requirements). Voter consensus: 82.9% approval, prioritize completeness of policy sections and Bloom's progression. Incorporate these pedagogical elements: - Learning Objectives: [insert full list from JSON] - Active Learning: [insert summaries] - Scaffolding: [insert full 4 layers with content] Generate 75 high-quality flashcards using the exact schema: [insert full flashcard_schema from JSON] Ensure flashcards: - Progress through Bloom's Taxonomy. - Map to scaffolding layers. - Tie into active learning (e.g., 'Extend to discussion: ...'). - Cover 12 PCI DSS requirements (e.g., Req 1: Firewall, Req 2: No vendor defaults, etc.). - Use authoritative sources: PCI SSC, v4.0. Output as JSON array: [{'front': '...', 'back': {...}}]. No additional text.
